problem.markdown:
1. The type of register in which data is entered into it only one bit at a time but all data bits available at the output is () Parallel in serial out () Parallel in Parallel out (x) Serial in serial out () Serial in parallel out
2) The type of register in which we have access only to left most and right most flip-flop is (x) Serial in serial out register () Shift left and shift right register () Serial in parallel out register () Shift left register
3) A universal register is () Accept serial input () Accept parallel input () Gives serial and parallel output (x) Is capable of all the input
4) The ripple counter is () Decade counter () Synchronous sequential circuit (x) Asynchronous sequential circuit () All above
5) The number of flip-flops required for mod 16 ring counter are () 4 () 8 () 12 (x) 16
problem.p: 1. The type of register in which data is entered into it only one bit at a time but all data bits available at the output is
2) The type of register in which we have access only to left most and right most flip-flop is

choicegroup.choice: Shift left and shift right register
Is capable of all the input
